item.title: 7 Iranians arrested in U.K. counterterrorism operations, officials say
item.description: British authorities say 8 men, at least 7 of them Iranian, have been arrested in London and 2 other areas over a specific attack plot and a separate s...

item.title: Divorce lawyer arrested 12 years after Ohio nurse stabbed to death
item.description: The arrest of 51-year-old Gregory J. Moore marks the latest twist in a cold case that has eluded Ohio authorities since 2013.

item.title: Met Gala theme "Superfine: Tailoring Black Style" explained
item.description: The Met Gala is back for 2025 in NYC, shining a spotlight on Black dandyism. Here's what to know about this year's theme explained.

item.title: 3 dead, 5 hurt in shooting at Glendale, Arizona steakhouse, police say
item.description: Glendale, Arizona police say three people are dead and five injured after a shooting at a business Sunday night. No one was under arrest.

item.title: The Real ID deadline is approaching. Here's what to know.
item.description: Americans will be required to switch to the new form of identification by Wednesday, May 7, if they want to fly domestically.
